ca.uqac.lif.labpal.table.rendering

Class LatexTableRenderer

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.uqac.lif.labpal.table.rendering.TableNodeRenderer
      • ca.uqac.lif.labpal.table.rendering.LatexTableRenderer

  • public class LatexTableRenderer
extends TableNodeRenderer
    Renders a result tree as a LaTeX table. The resulting table uses the multirow package to merge cells vertically.
    Author:
    Sylvain Hall√©

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  LatexTableRenderer.EnvironmentName
      The name of the LaTeX environment that displays the table

    • Field Detail

      • CRLF

        protected static final String CRLF
        OS-dependent carriage return

      • m_numColumns

        protected transient int m_numColumns
        A counter for the columns in the table

      • m_datapointHyperlinks

        protected boolean m_datapointHyperlinks
        Whether to enclose data points inside hyperlinks

      • m_keyBuffer

        protected final transient StringBuilder m_keyBuffer
        A buffer to hold the column headers until we know how many columns there are. This is due to the fact that a tabular environment in LaTeX must specify the alignment of each column before the keys are listed, and so in our case before we know how many keys there are.

      • m_boldKeys

        protected boolean m_boldKeys
        Whether the table's column headers are printed in bold

      • m_repeatedCells

        protected transient int m_repeatedCells
        The number of repeated cells the last time a table line was started

      • m_environmentName

        protected LatexTableRenderer.EnvironmentName m_environmentName
        The name of the LaTeX environment that displays the table

        public void setBoldKeys(boolean b)
        Sets whether the table's column headers are printed in bold
        Parameters:

      • setDatapointHyperlinks

        public void setDatapointHyperlinks(boolean b)
        Sets whether the data points in the table will be enclosed in hyperlinks containing their ID
        Parameters:
        b - Set to true to enable hyperlinks, false otherwise

      • startRow

        public void startRow(StringBuilder out,
                     int max_depth)
        Description copied from class: TableNodeRenderer
        Generates the portion of the output corresponding to the start of a "row". Depending on the output format, a row may mean different things.

        max_depth - The number of columns in a row of the structure

      • printCell

        public void printCell(StringBuilder out,
                      List<ca.uqac.lif.json.JsonElement> values,
                      int nb_children,
                      int max_depth,
                      TableNode node)
        Description copied from class: TableNodeRenderer
        Prints a cell
        Specified by:
        printCell in class TableNodeRenderer
        Parameters:
        out - The string builder to which the rendering is written
        values - The list of values in this row of the structure
        nb_children - The number of children this cell has in the tree
        max_depth - The number of columns in a row of the structure
        node - The table node corresponding to the cell to print
